    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BugStatus
    Enum holding a bug status
    BugTracker
    Bug tracker Application Run point
    BugTrackerApp
    Class for the entry point
    BugTrackerView
    Interface for the user interface.
    CliEnglishView
    English language CLI user interface
    CliGermanView
    German language CLI user interface
    Comment
    Class that holds comments that can be assigned to issues
    InvalidIssueDataException
    Custom exception for signalizing impropoer Issue creation/edition
    Issue
    Class for storing Issue details
    IssueManager
    Class holding all issues
    IssueNotFoundException
    Custom exception for signalizing that no such issue exists
    Priority
    Enum holding priority status of an issue
    UiLanguage
     
    User
    Represents a user in the system with basic profile information, unique identifier, creation and activity timestamps, and a list of roles.
    UserRole
    Enum holding user role
